1.content:
Jack was, unfortunately, not a very normal boy. When he was born, he was diagnosed with a very rare condition. He would only grow to a maximum height of 6 inches tall, the doctors had said. His parents didn’t want to believe them, but it turned out to be true nonetheless.

Throughout most of his life his parents kept him home for fear of what might happen to him. It wasn’t until he was fifteen years old that they decided to let him go out and experience life. They signed him up to Brookesville High School. You might think that sending a 6-inch kid to a public high school is just asking for trouble, but there were a few things going for the little guy. His physical condition came with a couple perks. As far as he could tell, he could not be harmed. He’d fallen into water before he could swim, but didn’t drown. He had been crushed by heavy objects multiple times, but was never injured. Nothing could hurt him.

And, to add on top of that, he was very good looking. He had perfect complexion and a face that looked like it came straight from Hollywood. He thought that his looks alone would send him through high school with little to no issues. And he was right to begin with. He made sure to say exactly the right thing in just the right way to get people to like him. He was one of the popular kids, despite his size, and that was all he cared about. His reputation was everything to him, but it was only a matter of time before everything got ruined.

And so begins this story, with Jack waking up and getting ready for school, completely unaware of the terrible things about to happen to him.
1.title: Beginning

choices: He's too late, the bus starts driving away.
11.content:
Jack opened up his closet to get dressed, scanning the options. Much to his disappointment, the only shirts that were clean were black or grey. Normally, he wouldn’t mind wearing these, but not in public. He strictly only wore bright eye-catching colors, which let others see him more easily and avoid causing any sort of accident.

He guessed that his mother must have forgotten to do his laundry last week. He’d have to make sure she stayed on top of that, but today, there was nothing else he could do about it except wear what he had. With a sigh, he pulled out a plain grey shirt and put it on, along with his other clothes.

Once everything was packed and ready, he marched up to the front door. Down at the bottom, there was a small cutout where a miniature door, more his size, was installed. This was built once his mom decided he could have more freedoms. He never used the door, other than to head outside to the bus stop, but he was still glad that he had the ability to leave whenever he wanted.

Pulling open the door, he wandered out into the driveway and onto the sidewalk. From here, it was only a fifteen minute walk to the bus stop. He picked up the pace a little, not wanting to miss the bus. He’d made that mistake once, and his mother was not very happy. She was always looking for some excuse to keep him at him and take away all of his responsibilities. If he missed it a second time, she could very well pull him out of school and force him to stay home. And he couldn’t have that. The only friends he had were from the school. If he had to stay home, he’d only have his mom and sisters for company forever. Now that sounded like a nightmare.

Just about a minute away, he could hear the bus pull up to the stop and the doors open. Jack instantly started sprinting the rest of the way. He couldn’t see the bus, since the sidewalk was lined with relatively tall bushes. “I’m coming!” He cried out, hoping that the driver could hear him. “Don’t leave, I’m almost there!”
11.title: The Start of the Day

112.content:
He was nearly out of breath when he rounded the corner at the bus stop and, to his relief, the bus was still there. The driver inside tapped his finger on the steering wheel impatiently, frowning at Jack as he approached.

“Taking your time today, aren’t you?” He grumbled.

Waving his hand in dismissal after he pulled himself up the last step. “I’m always on time. You’re just early.” Jack continued down the isle until he reached his regular seat. Throwing his back up, he then climbed up the side to join it. Once in place, the bus started moving again to the next destination.

Just a few minutes later, the bus cam to a stop again and the doors opened. Several kids entered the bus, chatting noisily to each other. Most of them sat down in the first empty seats near the front, but one of them, a young blond girl was walking right towards his seat. He cleared his throat subtly to draw her attention, just in case she didn’t see him, but she made no indication of noticing him.
112.title: On the Bus

1122.content:
His heart nearly stopped as she nonchalantly moved in towards his seat and turning around as if to sit down right on the seat he chose. The massive jean-clad butt presented itself above him. He’d almost enjoy the view if he wasn’t so scared. Luckily for him, though, the girl continued shimmying down until she reached the adjacent seat by the window.

Jack sighed heavily, glad that this didn’t turn into a situation. Once his hear rate had slowed down a bit, he turned to say high, but immediately saw her purse rushing towards him, falling directly on top of him. He didn’t even have time to say a word before the bag dropped down and smothered him. He had no idea what was inside the bag, but it was heavy. He couldn’t even shift his arms underneath the weight. He tried yelling, but barely any sound made it through the thick fabric.

Jack cursed under his breath. This was all his mom’s fault for not washing his bright shirts. At least this was better than being sat on, but it was still unpleasant and a little embarrassing.

As he laid there, unable to move, and grumbling to himself about how ignorant his mother was, the bus hit a rather large pothole in the road and the whole bus lurched into the air, sending the purse almost a foot off the seat of the couch. Jack initially though that he was free from underneath, but then, as the purse fell back down, it tipped over and the open bag fell mouth-first back on top of him. All the contents fell and battered him from every angle.

“Shit.” He heard the girl next to him say. “Learn how to drive!” The bag was then pulled off of him, but now his situation was even worse. Nearly his entire body was covered by the various contents, obscuring him from her vision. He could just barely see the giant hand come down and start brushing him, along with everything else, back into the purse.

“Hey, wait a second!” Jack tried to tell her, but she shoved him into the bag and piled more stuff on top of him. In just a few seconds, everything was back inside and she zipped the bag shut to avoid the spill from happening again. “Great. This is just great.” He groaned. Not only was he trapped underneath a heavy pile of stuff, which was a little painful on its own, but he was trapped with no way to get out. There was no way he’d be able to operate the zipper from this side of the bag, even if he could manage to find a way out from underneath all this junk.

At this point, he knew that struggling would be completely pointless, just serving to waste his energy. So he stayed still in the pitch black confines of the purse, every once in a while screaming as loud as he could, hoping to get the girl’s attention, but as far as he could tell, not a single soul heard him. All he could do was wait and hope she opens the bag and lets him out.
1122.title: The Contents of a Purse

11222.content:
Jack could hear the sounds of students talking and laughing in the halls of his high school, all of them preparing for class. The bag that he was stuck in was swinging back and forth to the girl’s movements. All of the sudden, he could hear a door being pushed open and then all the voices disappeared. What was going on? Jack wondered. Were they in a classroom? No, that can’t be it. He should still be able to hear classmates talking if that were the case.

He stayed still, trying to listen to what was going on. Before long, the mouth of the bag opened up and revealed the girl’s massive hand reaching in. She rummaged around in the bag before finding what she was looking for. Her fingers curled around the object and began pulling it out, but she was unaware that on the underside of the object, she had accidentally grabbed him as well.

Not knowing what was going on, he decided to stay still and wait. As she was lifting he out, her hand slipped and both he and the thing she grabbed began falling. He winced as he prepared for a hard impact with the floor, but that didn’t happen. He landed on a soft elastic surface and the other item from the bag landed right next to him.

Jack saw her hand reaching down from above to grab what she dropped, so he quickly crawled to the side and waited until her hand disappeared. The girl pulled her hand away and everything went quiet. That was a close one. He didn’t know what would have happened if she grabbed him, but whatever it was, it couldn’t have been good.

He began to take a look around at his surroundings to figure out where he was exactly. Instantly, he realized and he became very uncomfortable. He could tell by the thin walls that he was in a bathroom stall. Turning around, sure enough, he could see the girl’s legs on both sides of him leading all the way up to the top of a toilet where her vagina was unknowingly exposed to him. He was sitting in her panties that were currently around her ankles and the girl had no idea he was there. She was too busy with a little mirror, touching up her makeup.

Okay, he had to get out of here now. Things could go really wrong really fast. If she found him, he’s pretty much dead. She would think he was a pervert and punish him. Not wanting to find out what kind of punishment she was capable of dealing, he quickly tried to push himself up onto his feet, but something was wrong. His foot was caught on a bunch of loose threads.

Jack quickly tugged as hard as he could, trying to get free, but he was really tangled up. To make matters worse, the girl finished what she was doing, tossed her makeup kit into her purse and began lifting panties back up. You could now see the entirety of her huge ass moving towards you at an alarming rate!

info.brief_description: Jack is only 6 inches tall. How will he handle a school filled with Giants and Giantesses?
info.description:
This story follows a fifteen-year-old boy, Jack, in high school who stopped growing at 6 inches tall. Despite all his efforts, he keeps finding himself in humiliating and often gross situations with everyone around him.

He shares a house with his mother Madison (age 47), and his three sisters: Sarah (age 8), Emily (age 14), Mary (17)

Rules:

Jack cannot die. No matter how much his body is punished, he remains unharmed. He can still feel pain, mind you, but no physical harm can be inflicted on him.

Literally ANY and ALL interactions are acceptable and welcome. If you can think of it, feel free to share it. No discrimination here.

If you're going to add, just make sure that you can write english reasonably well.

Other than that, I can't think of anything. Please enjoy!
